jv_history.partner_name: Reverend Lisa. Q. Fetterman: From Food Tech Entrepreneurship to Positive Psychology & Plant Ministry
jv_history.source_quote: Lisa Q. Fetterman, Founder of the Plant Minister, and Co-Founder of Lead Embodied is a psychedelic minister ... Welcome to The Cosmic Whispers Podcast where we delve

what_you_do: I'm a psycho-spiritual counselor, meditation teacher and creator of the Karma Clearing Process™. I help my clients to become karmic warriors so that they can break free from habitual patterns, heal past wounds and create a life of freedom, fulfillment, and joy.
who_you_serve: I work with high-performing, spiritually-driven women and men who refuse to settle for a life constrained by old wounds and limiting patterns.
social_proof: I'm the founder of the Tantric Arts Collective, a community of women teachers and practitioners dedicated to supporting seekers through the wisdom of non-dual Tantra. I also founded the Living Tantra Project, an ongoing membership that helps people bring these teachings into daily life through practice, guidance, and integration.
signature_programs: The Karmic Warrior Oracle, Karma Clearing Process™, Tantric Arts Collective, Living Tantra Project
business_focus: Helping clients become karmic warriors to break free from habitual patterns, heal past wounds, and create a life of freedom, fulfillment, and joy.
service_provided: psycho-spiritual counseling, meditation classes, spiritual counseling
